name: Cantaloupe Bread with Praline Glaze
author: Kaddy
summary: This excellent bread is very moist and has the texture of pumpkin or zucchini bread. Can puree and freeze extra cantaloupe to make bread in the off season.
ingredients: 2 cups cantaloupe - peeled, seeded and pureed
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Lightly grease and flour two 9x5 inch loaf pans
In a large bowl, beat together eggs, vegetable, sugar, vanilla and cantaloupe
In a separate bowl, sift together flour, salt, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon and ginger
Stir flour mixture into cantaloupe mixture; stir to combine
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour, until a toothpick inserted into center of a loaf comes out clean
Meanwhile, combine margarine and brown sugar
Microwave for 3 minutes, stirring at 1 minute intervals; mix in pecans
Let cool for 1 hour before serving
